column4: Hi. I just installed 9.10 on my Toshiba and my sound isnt working. I looked online and found some terminal code that fixed it for a little whileand now it's not working. IDT it is detecting my sound card. PLEASE HELP. I need someone to walk me through a permanent audio fix!
what was the terminal fix that worked?
I cant remember... I think it was an ALSA update. and maybe some code that made alsa detect my realtek
I cant remember... I think it was an ALSA update. and maybe some code that made alsa detect my realtek
